title: Thin Sole Shoes
description:
When you want to feel the earth beneath you, grab some thin sole shoes. These will help your sports performance by mimicking your natural movements

  • Minimal rise
  • Subtle design and colors
  • Designed to improve performance by 50%
  • Light enough to run on water
  • Minimal branding
  • Not a ninja
  • ... but I play one in my backyard
  • Wide toe box
